resonance: Check focus level. Set 3 minutes. Start now.
frequency: Pick one alignment target. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
alignment: Reorder the next task. Stay for 30 seconds. Stop at timer.
Check body. Play one steady sound. Return once.
Do one more. Cut one distraction. Keep it small.
Close gently. Lock the next phase. Mark next time.
Why: Tiny phase shifts create big alignment.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.

rituals.name: Alignment Check — TS-08290
rituals.plain:
alignment: Rate energy 0–10. Set 30 seconds. Start now.
phase: Select one outcome. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
resonance: Do the first 2 minutes. Stay for 2 minutes. Stop at timer.
Check body. Add a resonance anchor. Return once.
Do one more. Notice drift and return. Keep it small.
Close gently. Schedule a follow-up. Mark next time.
Why: A resonance anchor makes focus stick.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.

rituals.name: Resonance Anchor — TS-08311
rituals.plain:
phase: Name your current state. Set 3 minutes. Start now.
resonance: Set one intention. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
frequency: Adjust phase by one step. Stay for 30 seconds. Stop at timer.
Check body. Use a cue word. Return once.
Do one more. Re-center the intention. Keep it small.
Close gently. Close the loop. Mark next time.
Why: A resonance anchor makes focus stick.
